channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: My friend Guy Kawasaki has a new book out, right now, which you can buy. If you want a great read from a person who knows how to develop and market ideas with humor, wisdom, love and integrity, this is the one to get.

item.description: The "Supreme Court" did more than law-making, they usurped the power to amend the Constitution. Not sure who's the bigger insurrectionist, Trump or these people.
